mapper.select: SELECT * FROM members m INNER JOIN ( SELECT c.certificate_num AS certificate_num , c.certificate_date AS certificate_date , c.reservation_num AS reservation_num , c.description AS description , c.file_key AS certificate_file , r.member_id AS member_id , r.doctor_id AS doctor_id , r.reservation_date AS reservation_date , r.reservation_status AS reservation_status , d.doctor_email AS doctor_email , d.hospital_id AS hospital_id , d.doctor_name AS doctor_name , d.doctor_birth AS doctor_birth , d.doctor_sex AS doctor_sex , d.doctor_tel AS doctor_tel , d.doctor_subject AS doctor_subject , d.doctor_major AS doctor_major , d.doctor_comments AS doctor_comments , d.file_key AS doctor_file , h.hospital_name AS hospital_name , h.hospital_addr_main AS hospital_addr_main , h.hospital_addr_detail AS hospital_addr_detail , h.file_key AS hospital_file , h.hospital_lati AS hospital_lati , h.hospital_long AS hospital_long , h.partnership_status AS partnership_status , p.payment_id AS payment_id , p.payment_date AS payment_date , p.transaction_type AS transaction_type , p.payment_status AS payment_status , m.member_name AS member_name , m.member_tel AS member_tel , m.member_birth AS member_birth FROM certificate c INNER JOIN reservation r ON c.reservation_num = r.reservation_num INNER JOIN doctor d ON r.doctor_id = d.doctor_id INNER JOIN hospital h ON d.hospital_id = h.hospital_id INNER JOIN payments p ON c.certificate_num = p.certificate_num INNER JOIN members m ON m.member_id = r.member_id ) AS j ON m.member_id = j.member_id WHERE j.doctor_id = ${doctorId};

SELECT * FROM members m INNER JOIN ( SELECT c.certificate_num AS certificate_num , c.certificate_date AS certificate_date , c.reservation_num AS reservation_num , c.description AS description , c.file_key AS certificate_file , r.member_id AS member_id , r.doctor_id AS doctor_id , r.reservation_date AS reservation_date , r.reservation_status AS reservation_status , d.doctor_email AS doctor_email , d.hospital_id AS hospital_id , d.doctor_name AS doctor_name , d.doctor_birth AS doctor_birth , d.doctor_sex AS doctor_sex , d.doctor_tel AS doctor_tel , d.doctor_subject AS doctor_subject , d.doctor_major AS doctor_major , d.doctor_comments AS doctor_comments , d.file_key AS doctor_file , h.hospital_name AS hospital_name , h.hospital_addr_main AS hospital_addr_main , h.hospital_addr_detail AS hospital_addr_detail , h.file_key AS hospital_file , h.hospital_lati AS hospital_lati , h.hospital_long AS hospital_long , h.partnership_status AS partnership_status , p.payment_id AS payment_id , p.payment_date AS payment_date , p.transaction_type AS transaction_type , p.payment_status AS payment_status , m.member_name AS member_name , m.member_tel AS member_tel , m.member_birth AS member_birth FROM certificate c INNER JOIN reservation r ON c.reservation_num = r.reservation_num INNER JOIN doctor d ON r.doctor_id = d.doctor_id INNER JOIN hospital h ON d.hospital_id = h.hospital_id INNER JOIN payments p ON c.certificate_num = p.certificate_num INNER JOIN members m ON m.member_id = r.member_id ) AS j ON m.member_id = j.member_id WHERE j.certificate_num = ${certificateNum};
SELECT d.*, h.hospital_name FROM doctor d LEFT OUTER JOIN hospital h ON d.hospital_id = h.hospital_id WHERE doctor_confirm_yn = 'Y'
SELECT d.doctor_email , d.doctor_name , d.doctor_tel , d.doctor_birth , d.doctor_addr_main , d.doctor_addr_detail , d.doctor_sex FROM doctor d WHERE doctor_confirm_yn = 'N'

SELECT d.doctor_id , d.doctor_name , (SELECT hospital_name FROM hospital h WHERE d.hospital_id = h.hospital_id) AS hospital_name , d.doctor_major , d.doctor_subject , d.doctor_comments , r.rating , r.review_title , r.comments , ( SELECT IFNULL(AVG(rr.rating), 0) FROM reviews rr WHERE d.doctor_id = rr.doctor_id AND rr.status = 'RY' ) AS '평균' FROM doctor d LEFT OUTER JOIN reviews r ON d.doctor_id = r.doctor_id AND r.status = 'RY' WHERE d.doctor_subject = #{doctorSubject} GROUP BY doctor_id;

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN review_title = '친절하게 알려주셨어요' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS review_titleA , SUM(CASE WHEN review_title = '꼼꼼하게 진단해주셨어요' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS review_titleB , SUM(CASE WHEN review_title = '정확하게 처방해주셨어요' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS review_titleC , COUNT(*) AS review_cnt , COUNT(rating) AS rating_cnt , ROUND(AVG(rating),1) AS rating_avg FROM reviews WHERE doctor_id = #{doctorId};

SELECT d.*, h.hospital_name, f.file_path FROM doctor d LEFT OUTER JOIN hospital h ON h.hospital_id = d.hospital_id LEFT OUTER JOIN file f ON f.file_key = d.file_key WHERE doctor_email = #{doctorEmail}
SELECT * FROM doctor_avail da INNER JOIN doctor d ON d.doctor_id = da.doctor_id WHERE d.doctor_email = #{doctorEmail}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doctor_avail(doctor_id, day, starttime, endtime) VALUES (#{doctorId}, '월요일', '09:00', '18:00'), (#{doctorId}, '화요일', '09:00', '18:00'), (#{doctorId}, '수요일', '09:00', '18:00'), (#{doctorId}, '목요일', '09:00', '18:00'), (#{doctorId}, '금요일', '09:00', '18:00'), (#{doctorId}, '토요일', '09:00', '18:00'), (#{doctorId}, '일요일', '09:00', '18:00'), (#{doctorId}, '공휴일', '09:00', '18:00')
mapper.select: SELECT m.member_name AS member_name , m.member_tel AS member_tel , m.member_birth AS member_birth , TO_CHAR(c.certificate_date, 'YYYY-mm-DD') AS certificate_date , p.amount AS payment_amount , d.doctor_name AS doctor_name , c.file_key AS certificate_file , c.description AS description FROM certificate c INNER JOIN reservation r ON c.reservation_num = r.reservation_num INNER JOIN members m ON m.member_id = r.member_id INNER JOIN doctor d ON d.doctor_id = r.doctor_id LEFT JOIN payments p ON c.certificate_num = p.certificate_num WHERE r.member_id = #{memberId} AND c.status = 'UY' ORDER BY c.certificate_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM reservation r WHERE r.reservation_status = 'R' OR r.reservation_status = 'W' AND r.doctor_id = #{doctorId}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM reservation r WHERE r.reservation_status = 'W' AND r.doctor_id = #{doctorId}
SELECT sum(p.amount) AS sum FROM payments p WHERE p.doctor_id = #{doctorId}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM reviews r WHERE doctor_id = #{doctorId}
SELECT ROUND(AVG(rating)) AS avg FROM reviews r WHERE doctor_id = #{doctorId}
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE doctor_id = #{doctorId} ORDER BY review_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count, doctor_subject FROM doctor d GROUP BY doctor_subject
